title: Front End Developer
description: ResponsibilitiesMengembangkan aplikasi web responsif dan berbasis komponen menggunakan React.jsMenggunakan React Hooks untuk mengelola state dan efek samping dalam komponen fungsionalMengimplementasikan manajemen state global menggunakan ReduxBerinteraksi dengan API melalui permintaan HTTP (REST atau GraphQL) untuk mengambil dan menyimpan dataMemastikan penggunaan optimal dari fitur-fitur React.js, serta memperhatikan performa dan kecepatan aplikasiBerkolaborasi dengan tim pengembangan dan desain untuk menghadirkan solusi yang inovatif dan user-friendlyMenguji dan mengoptimalkan aplikasi untuk memastikan kualitas dan kinerja yang baikBerpartisipasi dalam code review dan berbagi pengetahuan dengan anggota timRequirementsPengalaman kerja minimal 2 tahun sebagai Front-end EngineerPemahaman yang kuat tentang konsep pemrograman berorientasi objekMenguasai HTML, CSS, dan JavaScriptPengalaman dalam pengembangan aplikasi web menggunakan React.jsFamiliar dengan penggunaan React Hooks dan ReduxMemiliki pengetahuan tentang penggunaan alat pengujian di React.jsKemampuan untuk berintegrasi dengan API melalui permintaan HTTPMemiliki pemahaman tentang desain responsif dan pengembangan tampilan yang dapat diaksesMemiliki portofolio yang menunjukkan proyek-proyek sebelumnya yang melibatkan teknologi React.js, React Hooks, Redux, dan penggunaan APIKemampuan komunikasi yang baik dan mampu bekerja dalam tim

description: Gambaran PekerjaanSebagai Front End Developer (Intern), Anda akan bertanggung jawab dalam penerapan elemen visual dan berinteraksi dengan pengguna dalam aplikasi web, serta melakukan terjemahan wireframe desain UI / UX ke kode aktual yang akan menghasilkan elemen visual aplikasi dalam web (akan bekerja dengan desainer UI / UX dan menjembatani kesenjangan antara desain grafis dan implementasi teknis).Kualifikasi Mahasiswa jurusan Ilmu Komputer atau bidang terkait. title: Frontend Developer
description: PT Shell Infotech Indonesia is a leading Information Technology (IT) Consulting as well as IT Managed Services provider headquartered in Singapore.With over a decade of experience and 700+ employees working across multiple locations, we are able to leverage this vast expertise to deliver real value for our customers in the fields of IT Software Services, SAP Services, Enterprise Applications, IT Managed Services & automatic fare collection systems.The RoleYou Will Be Responsible ForUnderstand the clients' requirements to develop proposals and suggest solutions to help them meet their business objectives.Determining project requirements and goals, defining the scope of the engagement and planning timelines.Working closely with technical teams to ensure towards smooth delivery of solutions.Working in a team of consultants and on various consulting engagements.Writing well-designed, testable and efficient code.Leading the design, creation, and implementation of a suite of software.Providing code documentation and other inputs to technical documents.Participating in release and sprint planning sessions.Ideal ProfileYou possess a Degree/Diploma in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.You have at least 1 year experience, ideally within an IT Consulting role.You have excellent written and verbal communication skills.You have a working knowledge of TAILWIND and GITYou are a strong networker & relationship builderYou are a strong team player who can manage multiple stakeholdersYou are adaptable and thrive in changing environmentsWhat's on Offer?Excellent career development opportunitiesWork within a company with a solid track record of successOpportunity to make a positive impact

title: Frontend Engineer
description: ResponsibilitiesWe are seeking a skilled Frontend Engineer to write clean, readable, and reusable code that covers CSS, JS, and HTML. You'll work collaboratively with the developer and product team to achieve our product goals.Write and develop program code that meets the requirements, with minimal bugs, and in accordance with industry best practices.Understanding of HTTP RequestsEnsure the UI/UX experience matches the product design.Debug production issues as they arise.Monitor and ensure the system developed is running as expected.Coordinate with the Product Manager to plan a sprint.Able to Peer-Review Code.RequirementsMinimum of 1 year of experience as a Frontend Developer, Software Engineer, or equivalent.Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Informatics Engineering, or related fields preferred.Experience with VueJS.Proficient with Git.Proficient with HTML, CSS, and Javascript/Typescript.Proficient with CSS preprocessors, especially Stylus.Strong attention to design.Good sense of UI/UX.Proficient in the following areas: BEM Concept, Docker, Nx dev tools, React.js, Next.js framework, Storybook, GraphQL.We're looking for someone who is passionate about frontend development, stays up-to-date with industry trends, and is committed to writing high-quality code. If you meet the above requirements and are eager to take on this exciting opportunity, we encourage you to apply.

title: Web Developer
description: ResponsibilitiesJob OverviewWe are seeking a highly skilled and creative Webmaster to join our team and take charge of managing our webstore. As the Webmaster, you will be responsible for enhancing the user interface (UI) and user experience (UX) of our webstore, optimizing its speed and functionality, and ensuring seamless development on the Shopify platform. You will collaborate with various stakeholders to revamp our webstore and create an exceptional online shopping experience for our customers.Job RoleOversee the design, layout, and functionality of our webstore to ensure a visually appealing and user-friendly experienceImplement improvements to the UI/UX, making data-driven decisions to enhance customer engagement and conversion ratesCollaborate with cross-functional teams, including marketing and development, to understand business requirements and align webstore functionalities accordinglyTroubleshoot and resolve any issues related to webstore performance, ensuring optimal speed, functionality, and compatibility across different devices and browsersUtilize your strong logical thinking and problem-solving skills to identify and resolve errors or bugs in a timely mannerStay up to date with the latest trends and best practices in web design, UI/UX, and e-commerce to suggest innovative ideas for continuous improvementProvide support and guidance to the team regarding Shopify functionality and integrationsRequirementsJob QualificationsBachelor's degree in Computer Science, Web Design, or a related field (or equivalent experience)Proven experience as a Webmaster or similar role, with a strong portfolio showcasing your UI/UX expertise and successful webstore managementProficiency in Shopify, including theme customization, app integrations, and performance optimizationSolid understanding of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Ruby, with the ability to modify code as neededFamiliarity with Shopify Liquid, the templating language used in Shopify, for customizing themes and working with Shopify's data objectsStrong analytical and problem-solving skills to troubleshoot and resolve issues efficientlyExcellent attention to detail and ability to multitask in a fast-paced environmentAbility to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and communicate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholdersUp-to-date knowledge of current web design trends, UI/UX best practices, and e-commerce industry standardsStrong organizational skills and ability to meet deadlinesFast and lifelong learner is a must

title: Frontend Developer
description: We are looking for a skilled and motivated Front-end Developer to join our team. As a Front-end Developer, you will be responsible for creating exceptional user experiences and crafting visually appealing web applications. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to transform design mock-ups into functional and interactive websites.ResponsibilitiesDevelop responsive and user-friendly web applications using Angular, TypeScript, SCSS, and other related technologies.Implement UI/UX designs effectively, ensuring a seamless user experience.Conduct thorough testing and debugging of frontend applications to ensure optimal functionality and performance.Work closely with cross-functional teams to understand project requirements and deliver high-quality solutions.Assist in the identification and resolution of frontend issues reported by users or stakeholders.Optimize web applications for maximum speed and scalability.RequirementsMin 1 year of work experience in frontend development using Angular. If the candidate has less than 1 year of experience, a portfolio can be provided as an alternative.Proficiency in TypeScript, Angular 7+, SCSS, and other related technologies.Familiarity with web responsive design principles and best practices.Strong preference for candidates who have experience working with or implementing Micro Frontend architecture and Progressive Web Apps (PWA).Good communication skills and the ability to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams.Demonstrated ability to work on multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines.A passion for front-end development and a drive to stay up-to-date with industry trends and advancements.

title: Frontend Developer
description: As part of our effort to continue our digital transformation, and to implement our initiatives to meet customer needs, develop new capabilities, ensure new critical infrastructure, and participate in new industry ecosystem PT Bluebird Tbk is looking for React Developer.What Will You Do:Develop enhancements to current or new web applications, including feature/layout enhancements as well as technical improvements.Build reusable code and libraries for future useIdentify things that can go wrong early but also investigate bugs reported in production.Work well and closely with the Product team, Backend Engineers, and QA engineers.What You Need:Bachelor's degree majoring in computer science or other related fields.Experience min. 3 years as Frontend EngineerExpertise in ReactJS, Redux, Micro Frontend, Single page application, and Unit Testing.Experience with Front End Framework Material UI / Ant Design, and Figma.Understanding Software Development Life Cycle.Knowledge of secure software development practices.Deep understanding of version control (GIT).Strong analytical, design, logical and programming skills.Experienced in building clean, maintainable, and well-tested code.Advanced troubleshooting skills.Why Bluebird Group?We have more than 25,000 fleets, from taxi, rental car, corporate car, rental bus, airport bus, school bus to logistics around Indonesia.We have more than 150 developers that split into multi product squads (cross-functional team), and we keep increasing.We always innovate our MyBlueBird app, DriverApp, BirdKirim, Corporate app, Taxi Operation, etc.Our IT culture also always be together, openness, humble, and hungry for learning, and we need these for agility.We think, mistake is needed to be successful. So, always dare to improve.Let's Apply & Join Our IT Squad!

title: WEB DEVELOPER
description: Company Description: PT Mulia Industrindo Tbk didirikan pada tanggal 5 November 1986 sebagai perusahaan yang bergerak di bidang perdagangan atas hasil produksi entitas anak. Perseroan terdaftar dalam Bursa Efek Jakarta pada tanggal 17 Januari 1994. PT Mulia Industrindo Tbk semula mempunyai 2 entitas anak, PT Muliaglass dan PT Muliakeramik Indahraya. Pada bulan Oktober 2017, Perseroan menjual seluruh kepemilikannya di PT Muliakeramik Indahraya kepada PT Eka Gunatama Mandiri, sebuah perusahaan terafiliasi. Aksi korporasi ini dilakukan untuk mendukung rencana Perseroan untuk memperbaiki dan meningkatkan posisi keuangannya sebagai perusahaan publik. Setelah divestasi tersebut, Perseroan hanya memiliki satu entitas anak, yaitu PT Muliaglass. PT Muliaglass bergerak di bidang industri kaca dengan kaca lembaran, glass block, kemasan kaca, dan kaca pengaman otomotif sebagai hasil produksinya. Job Description:WEB DEVELOPER

title: Front End Developer CRM Product and Service Management
description: Company Description: PT Infomedia Nusantara merupakan subsidiary PT Telkom Indonesia yang memfokuskan bisnisnya pada penyediaan solusi Business Process Outsourcing (BPO) melalui 2 portofolio bisnis, yaitu: Customer Relationship Management (CRM) dan Shared Service Operation (SSO). Hingga saat ini, kami telah mengelola proses bisnis dari 600 lebih perusahaan dari berbagai segmen industri. Dalam perjalanan bisnisnya, Infomedia menguasai 53% market share contact center, yang terus dikembangkan dengan mengadopsi teknologi digital terdepan untuk memastikan experience terbaik bagi pelanggan. Job Description: Membangun Front End Aplikasi CRM Omnichannel Memiliki detail design & sistem analisis aplikasi Mempelajari kebutuhan modul dan fitur dalam aplikasi Dapat melakukan Design Database, Coding, Testing dan integrasi aplikasi Berpartisipasi dan bertanggung jawab kepada semua level dalam proses Software Life Cycle Melakukan maintain, support, dan enhance kepada aplikasi selama masa kontrak

title: Web Back-End Developer
description: A fast-scaling startup with a penchant for innovation and a commitment to delivering cutting-edge solutions is in search of a Web Back-End Developer. This NYSE-listed company is pioneering advancements in the tech industry, continually pushing boundaries and setting new standards. The successful candidate will be instrumental in developing and maintaining various applications, contributing to the company's ongoing growth and success.The Web Back-End Developer will be responsible for creating and implementing server-side logic, ensuring high performance and responsiveness to front-end requests. They will also be tasked with seamlessly integrating front-end elements developed by their peers into the application, making an understanding of front-end technologies essential.The company fosters a vibrant and dynamic culture, emphasizing innovation, collaboration, and continuous learning. This role is an excellent opportunity for those who thrive in a fast-paced, challenging environment and are eager to apply their skills to real-world challenges.Job Responsibilities:Develop efficient and maintainable server-side code that ensures high performance and responsive user experiencesCollaborate with front-end teams to seamlessly integrate user-facing components into the applicationOptimize the application's speed and scalability to meet evolving demandsImplement stringent data protection and security protocolsDevise and manage data storage solutions for robust data managementStay current with industry trends, incorporating new technologies where applicableJob Requirements:Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or equivalent experienceA minimum of 11 years of overall experience in web developmentMinimum 2 years of experience in GraphQL and React, and 6 years in Spring BootStrong proficiency with Git and version controlFamiliarity with continuous integration best practicesExceptional problem-solving abilities and keen attention to detailProficiency in English and effective communication skills

title: Front-End Developer
description: A rapidly growing company transforming the environment of international e-commerce for Indian vendors is looking for a ReactJS Front-End Developer. The selected candidate will be responsible for identifying the project's weaknesses and offering suggestions for improvements. The company's technology simplifies and accelerates the worldwide growth process by changing current online stores and listings to meet the client demands of each country. This will be a full-time role that requires some overlap with the IST time zone.Job Responsibilities:Build, test, and deploy components for the micro front-end apps in conjunction with an agile team while adhering to Continuous Deployment (CD) principlesMake sure the site’s design is optimized for all screen sizes and strike a balance between useful and aesthetically pleasing designRecognize the project's shortcomings and suggest ways to make it better by understanding itUsing project check sheets, test cases, and other tools, guarantee timely and error-free deliveryMake reusable parts with varying degrees of complexity, from simple atomic bits like buttons to complicated high-level parts coupled to their own back-end servicesMaintain control over the production-related code, including deployment and troubleshootingJob Requirements:Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science (or equivalent experience)At least 3+ years of relevant experience as a software developer2-5+ years of experience with graduation from a Tier 1 Institute Prior experience working in the translation of UI/UX design wireframes to high-quality code while structuring and designing web pagesProficiency in developing reusable, modular user interface components and implementing them with HTML, CSS JavaScript, and ReactFamiliarity with React.js, its core principles, and popular React.js workflowsConversant with all best practices, industry standards, and existing open-source tools Self-starter and proactive with the ability to navigate independently and actively collaborate with internal and external stakeholdersAbility to propose innovative solutions to problems at handProficiency in English

title: React Web Developer
description: A U.S.-based company that is developing an innovative product to help businesses disrupt their industries and enter new markets, is looking for a React Web Developer. The selected candidate will be working closely with the CEO to make realistic projections with the team and make wise product management decisions. The company assists businesses in prioritizing insights and focusing more attention on issues and problem areas that actually mattered. This is a great opportunity for developers who are eager to learn and proactively seek clarification of the requirements.Job Responsibilities:Assist with business decisions by assisting in the technical evaluation of potential solutions and assisting in the decision to build or buyTo validate the use cases, create robust, testable code, and conduct unit, functional, acceptability, and/or user testsWhen necessary, participate in quality assurance, and create test-driven codeWork with and help manage a junior front-end developer to help complete this projectControlling technical debtSet clear, well-commented code that is effective so that other developers may use itAssess the trade-offs with the product managerInstead of just meeting the technical requirements, consider the requirements from the perspective of the user and develop solutions.Job Requirements:Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science (or equivalent experience)At least 3+ years of relevant experience as a software developerExtensive experience working with React and Web technologiesProlific experience with JavaScript FrameworksExtensive experience with Figma for prototypingDemonstrable experience working with TypeScript, HTML, CSS, and Relational databasesIn-depth knowledge of REST APIs, Docker, and Heroku for continuous deploymentStrong understanding of Jest for testing and oAuth for authenticationExtensive experience with Role Based Access Control (RBAC), Material UI components, and Web Accessibility (AA standards)Demonstrable experience working with Agile technologiesFluent in spoken and written English

title: React Developer
description: A fast-growing company active in the real estate space and offering a product that streamlines the entire real estate ecosystem, is looking for a React Developer. As a developer, you will be responsible for driving the completion of multiple projects in collaboration with the rest of the team.
